text.section: At least once every 6 years, which corresponds to the comprehensive plan revision process under § 1-416 of this subtitle, a charter county shall ensure the implementation of the visions, the development regulations element, and the sensitive areas element of the plan.

A charter county shall ensure that the implementation of the requirements of subsection (a) of this section are achieved through the adoption of applicable:
zoning laws; and
local laws governing:
planned development;
subdivision; and
other land use provisions that are consistent with the comprehensive plan.
